SID STUDENT_NAME STUDENT_EMAIL STUDENT_PHONE
{{student.sid}} {{student.sname}} {{student.semail}} {{student.sphone}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Student } from '../student'; import { StudentServiceService } from '../student-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-student-list', templateUrl: './student-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./student-list.component.css'] }) export class StudentListComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(private studentService:StudentServiceService) { } student :Student[]=[]; ngOnInit(): void { this.studentService.getAllStudent().subscribe(data=>{ this.student=data; }) } }
